content.raw:
> But I haven't actually measured the time.

Wow this takes 26 mins on pipelines, as opposed to the usual 9 mins. `run-clang-tidy-6.0.py` is doing some magic to make things quicker, it's just unfortunate that it doesn't expose the `-warnings-as-errors` flag :confused: 

I'll decline this for now. We should also explore alternatives to clang-tidy.
content.html:
But I haven't actually measured the time.

Wow this takes 26 mins on pipelines, as opposed to the usual 9 mins. run-clang-tidy-6.0.py is doing some magic to make things quicker, it's just unfortunate that it doesn't expose the -warnings-as-errors flag

I'll decline this for now. We should also explore alternatives to clang-tidy.
